sentences.en: A female criminal shall be checked by a people's policewoman.
sentences.cn: 女犯由女性人民警察检查.

sentences.en: A policewoman shot at the helicopter.
sentences.cn: 一名女警察向直升飞机射击。

sentences.en: He even tried to sweet-talk the policewoman who arrested him.
sentences.cn: 他甚至想和逮住他的女警官套近乎。

sentences.en: In 1984, Libyan gunmen murdered a British policewoman on the streets of London.
sentences.cn: 1984年，在伦敦的街上，利比亚持枪歹徒杀害了一名英国女警察。

sentences.en: IS that policewoman short or tall?
sentences.cn: 那个女警察是矮还是高?

sentences.en: Look at the policewoman at the crossing.

sentences.cn: 玛丽是一名出色的女警察.

sentences.en: Me and my friend told the policewoman.
sentences.cn: 我和我的朋友告诉了女警察.

sentences.en: Policewoman: ( stops and salutes ) Ha, ha, thanks!
sentences.cn: 女警察: ( 停步敬礼 ) 哈, 哈, 多谢!

sentences.en: Policewoman: Save trouble. Special profession, special personality. Thanks. Bye.
sentences.cn: 女警察: 不用麻烦了. 特别职业, 特别人品. 谢谢了. 再见!

sentences.en: She was a sort of policewoman-cum-prosecutor.
sentences.cn: 她可以说是警察兼检察官。

sentences.en: She was strongly committed to her job, a policewoman by eminence.
sentences.cn: 她非常忠于职守, 一位卓越的女警察.

sentences.en: She was strongly committed to her job, policewoman by eminence.
sentences.cn: 她非常忠于职守, 一位典型的(卓越的)女警察.
她是个作风奇特的女警.
这个女警察找人来帮忙.

sentences.en: The policewoman wrote down his particulars, ie his name , address, etc.
sentences.cn: 女警记下了他的个人资料.

sentences.en: This photo reveals the gentle side of the policewoman.
sentences.cn: 这张照片展现出了这位女警察娇柔的一面.
